amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit National Missile Defense funds from being obligated for deployment of space-based interceptors or space-based directed-energy weapons.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 6 in the Congressional Record of June 12, 1996, to prohibit the use of funds appropriated in the bill to be used for deployment of space-based interceptorsor space-based directed-energy weapons.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A012) as amended Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 208 (Roll no. 246).
